title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: September 06, 2023, 01:58:08 PMLast edit: September 06, 2023, 07:32:11 PM by minerjones
content: For auction are 6x #21 HODL cards from Cardsmiths Currency Series 1 as one lot:Diamond Refractor #1/1Beryl Refractor #106/149Emerald Refractor #72/99BaseHolofoilCrystal SparkleSTARTING BID: $1250MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: $5**Please limit bids to ONLY whole dollar amounts**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 11th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC or Dirty Fiat Dollars $$$. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: This maybe the last diamond that we will see come up for sale for a long time, no more on feebayAnd it's card #21, very symbolic number in the bitcoin community Good rainbow starter kit  I'll be following this auction.

comments.author: MahlNinja
comments.body: I like the diamond way more than the onyx. As a bystander.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Any bidders out there for this exclusive 1 of 1 card?

comments.author: MahlNinja
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 10, 2023, 01:04:38 PMAny bidders out there for this exclusive 1 of 1 card?  It's a shame eBay gets so much more action. We're giving them to big a cut. This will sell fast there I'm sure. Wish we had more off eBay action.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Ends in a little over 6 hours....  don't miss out, BID NOW!!

comments.body: Ended with no bidsContact me if you are interested in this card
